summary: Two soldiers form a lasting bond during training to be Navy Seals but soon grow apart as they are sent off to fight in Desert Storm.
cast: Rob Lowe|Gale Hansen|Tracy Griffith|Eb Lottimer|Baruch Dror|Daniel Dieker|Michael Cornelison|Evyatar Lazar|Tae-Joon Lee|Ari Sorko-Ram|Erik Degn|Natan Sgan-Cohen|Jonathan Herson|Uri Gavriel|John Phillips|Jack Widerker|Gilya Stern|Ava Haddad|Gregory Tal|Tristian R. Lawson|George Bush|Saddam Hussein|Stephen Sherman
title: Halcones de mar
